PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PointMachine
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of point machine used in railway. The property set can be used by IfcActuator with predefined type set to ELECTRICACTUATOR, HYDRAULICACTUATOR, HANDOPERATEDACTUATOR, or PNEUMATICACTUATOR, indicated that such actuator is a point machine that can switch and lock the track turnout.

PropertyDef.Name: ActionBarMovementLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The movement of the bar that pulls the point of a turnout.

PropertyDef.Name: TractionForce
PropertyDef.Definition: Traction force of the point machine in turnout conversion.

PropertyDef.Name: LockingForce
PropertyDef.Definition: Locking force of the point machine motor.

PropertyDef.Name: HasLockInside
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the locking is inside (TRUE) or outside (FALSE) of the point machine.

PropertyDef.Name: MarkingRodMovementLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the movement bar which indicates the turnout position.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumOperatingTime
PropertyDef.Definition: The maximum duration of the turnout movement before the interlocking turns to out of control status.

PropertyDef.Name: MinimumOperatingSpeed
PropertyDef.Definition: Minimum operating speed of the point machine.

PropertyDef.Name: Current
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual current and operable range.
